sentences.sContent: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
sentences.sCn: 他派出三名侦察兵到前面侦察大桥的情况。

synos.tran: 搜索，[航][军]侦察；侦察员；侦察机

phrases.pCn: n. 童子军；过于理想而不切实际者；单纯的政治家

words.tran: 童子军的活动；初步勘探；搜索活动
侦察，刺探；寻找；物色（人才等）（scout的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 搜索，侦察；侦察员；侦察机
trans.tranOther: a soldier, plane etc that is sent to search the area in front of an army and get information about the enemy
to examine a place or area in order to get information about it
